sql.if: WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_notice (bno, admin_id, title, content) VALUES (board_notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{adminId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board_notice WHERE bno = (SELECT bno_prev FROM (SELECT bno, LAG(bno, 1, 9999) OVER(ORDER BY bno DESC) AS bno_prev FROM board_notice) WHERE bno = #{bno})
SELECT * FROM board_notice WHERE bno = (SELECT bno_next FROM (SELECT bno, LEAD(bno, 1, 9999) OVER(ORDER BY bno DESC) AS bno_next FROM board_notice) WHERE bno = #{bno})
